I am a postdoc in the Department of Mathematics at the University of California, Los Angeles working with RaphaÃ«l Rouquier. Previously I was at the Max Plank Institute for Mathematics, Bonn and before that I was a phd student at the University of Edinburgh. My supervisors were Michael Wemyss and Iain Gordon.

I am primarily interested in representation theory. In particular Lie theory and the geometry and combinatorics that is associated with it. See my research page for more info on some of the things I am thinking about.
